01 - Pandas and Data Wrangling

In this homework you will test your skills in using the Pandas library for a few basic Data Transformation and Data Wrangling tasks. The homework consists in filling the cells indicated as exercises in the two notebooks presented during the Lab 02 - Intro to Pandas.

For each exercise, please provide both a written explanation of the steps you will apply to manipulate the data, and the corresponding code. Keep in mind that writing the explanation at the beginning can help you in two ways: 1) clarifying the steps in your mind before writing the actual code, 2) earning you points if the description is correct, regardless of the potential issues in your code.

Credits to Michele Catasta.
